entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Environment.UserInteractive` returns True on mac, even when the process is run in a non-interactive terminal #66530
  • Pattern matching ReadOnlySpan<char> is worse than String #66529
  • [Mono] Clean up the function calls #66525
    7.0.0
  • .net 6 broken migration JsonElement to dynamic #66517
  • [API Proposal]: Enable Regex filtering for FileSystemWatcher #66516
  • `AccessViolationException` breaks System.IO.FileSystem tests #66515
  • [hot reload] Update test infrastructure to consume metadata update handler type ids #66513
  • [API Proposal]: Set the default encoding of the serial port class to ISO/IEC 8859-1 to accommodate 8-bit bytes out of the box #66506
  • Recent change to Attribute.GetCustomAttributes is breaking in ASP.NET Core #66496
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `System.Math.Abs` overload for `System.Numerics.Complex` as `Complex.Magnitude` property #66494
  • [API Proposal]: Extend `JsonIgnoreCondition` #66490
    Future
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.WriteValueTests.SerializeExceedMaximumBufferSize #66487
  • System.Net.CookieContainer的bug，未能正确分辨domain最匹配的 #66526

Closed

  • JIT inlines bits of throw helpers #66527
  • [API Proposal]: Activity.HasRemoteParent (and problematic docs for Activity.Parent) #65660
    7.0.0
  • Transient services implementing IDisposable cause a memory leak #66483
  • Deadlock with SystemEvents when application is shutdown by Restart Manager #62042
    6.0.x
  • SourceBuild leg is not using source-built arcade #66514
  • API Proposal: Primitive Color and Color8 Types for .NET Core #32418
    Future
  • Proposal: Add Temporary and Sparse and to FileOptions #65155
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse42\\Crc32_ro\\Crc32_ro.cmd #65040
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Popcnt\\Popcnt_ro\\Popcnt_ro.cmd #65415
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Fma_Vector256\\Fma_ro\\Fma_ro.cmd #65474
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Bmi1.X64\\Bmi1.X64_r\\Bmi1.X64_r.cmd #65643
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\Vector128\\Vector128_r\\Vector128_r.cmd #66320
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Avx1\\Sqrt_ro\\Sqrt_ro.cmd #64957
  • Bmi2.X64_r failed with Could not load file or assembly 'C:\h\w\BA7A09DC\p\system.runtime.interopservices.dll'. Invalid access to memory location. (0x800703E6) #66484
  • Introduce System.IString interface and implement it on System.String #19711
    Future
  • Add conversion from Task -> CancellationToken method #23346
    Future
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.BinaryWriter_EncodingTests.WriteChars_VeryLargeArray_DoesNotOverflow #66488
  • [API Proposal]: Add Unsafe.AsOut method to simplify out parameters casting #58732
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.Append / Enumerable.AppendRange #66336
  • Please introduce methods for reading and writing memory on other processes #46357
    Future
  • Consider adding AppendFormattable to StringBuilder #35047
    Future
  • Enum API #29999
    Future
  • Add NullIfEmpty and NullIfWhitespace for string #28113
    Future
  • Enumerable.Repeat should allow for infinite repetition #28041
    Future
  • Add a way to force-initialize a System.Lazy #27509
    Future
  • OutOfRangeException with expect bounds. #27360
    Future
  • [Proposal] String.Format specifier for IEnumerable #21820
    Future
  • Make `System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHeapHandle` Public #20990
    Future
  • Add Enum method to remove not defined flags. #18190
    Future
  • Support for Time data type #31478
    Future
  • Add XmlReader.ResetState to enable pooling #2404
    Future
  • Question: Furthering use of Span<T> and ReadOnlySpan<T> with string manipulation. #27982
    Future
  • Implement Regex.CompileToAssembly for netcoreapp #30153
    Future
  • API Proposal: Regex.IsMatch with 'out Match' parameter #30308
    Future
  • Avoid need for pragma warning disables in Regex source generator #61666
    7.0.0
  • Extend Regex 32-bit/64-bit read optimization to IgnoreCase as well #62459
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] try this with icu updated #66528
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.4. #66524
    area-Build-mono
  • Ensure serializer reflection-dependency sentinel is accurate #66522
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Reenable HostApplicationBuilderTests disabled on Mono/Windows #66521
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Re-enable RevokeEndEntity_PolicyErrors_NotTimeValid #66520
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [mono] Less MonoClassField arithmetic and less direct offset access #66519
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix compiler warning 4244 in host #66518
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector WidenLower and WidenUpper on Arm64 #66512
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, needs-author-action
  • Implement X500DistinguishedNameBuilder #66509
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reenable a test in stress mode #66501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix assert failure in distribute_free_regions #66495
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use `wasm-tools` workload to run benchmarks for wasm #66493
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • issue-2214 Create File.ReadLinesAsync() #66492
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix stepping issues with ReadyToRun and TieredCompilation #66491
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Load C++/CLI DLLs in default ALC #66486
    area-Host

Merged

  • Add comment for use of DynamicDebugViewEmptyException.Empty #66510
    area-Microsoft.CSharp
  • Add Activity.HasRemoteParent #66489
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity
  • Revert "Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type" #66508
    area-System.Reflection
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Android 32 to RID graph #66022
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] update expected exception for cases when all requested TLS versions are disabled #65046
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement, 6.0.x
  • Write the exit code tag from the Apple app wrapper #66511
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Improve SSL platform detection (#64923) #65054
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement
  • Fix early JITDUMP disasm in ARM/ARM64 #66502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64 #66476
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/6.0] improve SslStream tests on misconfigured systems #65024
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add OSR to DacpTieredVersionData #66507
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] Fixup name of define #66523
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #66404
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Cleanup todo items from defines-todo.cmake #66408
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector Dot product and Sum on Arm64 #66391
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix catching of generic exception in crossgened shared generic code #66207
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • Use ApiCompatTask in ApiCompat.proj #66073
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add support for the new WASM Exception Handling feature #66435
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] stabilize QUIC tests on server 2022 #65097
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Run tests for internal azdo PRs #65526
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • don't run WriteChars_VeryLargeArray_DoesNotOverflow test on 32 bit #66503
    area-System.IO
  • Add armv8l virtualized 32-bit ARM core detection #66477
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix minor typo in comment #66497
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Refactor and improve MLL tests #66332
    area-Host
  • Update repo CMake configuration to target /W4 by default #66474
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [metadata] Avoid realloc and memcpy when >1 gparams on generics #66458
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Define SystemReflectionMetadataLoadContextVersion property for package references #65614
    area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • Improve performance of decrypt one shots #65725
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations #65535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Remove usages of native bootstrapping (#65901) #66406
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [draft] hot reload WIP #66455
    NO-MERGE, area-EnC-mono
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix JsonSerializer src-gen issues with reference handler feature #66422
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix nullability warnings for NativeAOT CoreLib #65137
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64985
    area-System.Console, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Build improvements #64938
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Add Fedora 37 RID #65392
    NO-MERGE, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add a target to force packages which reference serviced packages to also be serviced #66106
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: Always use SIMD features #66411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Enable CA1822 (Mark members as static) analyzer #66333
    area-Meta
  • Enable Fast Tail Call Optimization for ARM32 #66282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Make ConfigurationManager.Sources public #66485
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-preview2] Backport `[wasm] Fix a race condition in adding payloads for helix` #66478
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Do not assume containment #66385
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add time prefix to (almost) all superpmi.py output #66481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Remove 4146 from libunwind #66427
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885

  • Expose `LibraryImportAttribute` #66434
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add a flag to link against the system brotli #66462
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] struct casting #1865

Updated

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support for GT_DIV and GT_CAST( dbl->lng) #1867

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow --skip-manifest-update with dotnet update #24341
  • Allow dotnet workload list to return version and checksum of packages #24340
  • Allow "dotnet workload update --print-download-link-only --sdk-version" to work with prior SDK versions #24335
  • Support custom apphosts #24334
  • Attempting to codesign a MacOS app corrupts the app #24337
  • With .NET 7 Preview 3 SDK, fail to run .NET 7 winforms/wpf project #24329

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve loading of Roslyn assemblies on validate package task (#22277) #24339
  • Properly handle empty solution and project paths in SDK resolver #24333
    Area-SdkResolvers

Updated

  • Pin the compiler version in RSG to an exact version #24130
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24308
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Error using skip-manifest-update and --from-rollback-file #24288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge pull request #23302 from dotnet/marcpopMSFT-fixnet7condition #24328
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test retry #21186
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [EnC] CustomAttribute rows in delta seem out of order #60125
  • New rename dialog doesn't always allow Left / Right arrow navigation immediately after starting rename interaction #60117
  • Hang in MetadataAsSourceFileService.TryAddDocumentToWork #60115
  • IDE0059 adds a redundant blank line in some cases #60114
  • Unexpected scoping on type parameter of local function parameter #60110
    Backlog

Closed

  • Treat files copied from a NuGet package content as generated #55992
  • Update the inline rename UI #57715
    17.2
  • Debuggee app crashes on applying code changes #60099
  • `GetHashCode` of `Span<T>` is not suggested in `nameof` context #59998
    17.3
  • IDE0059 Quick Fix Duplicates Region #51401
    Backlog
  • Missing inline hint when suppress differing by suffix is enabled #60109
  • Erroneous error! IDE1007 The name 'var' does not exist in the current context #38947
    Backlog
  • C# Preview error MSB6006: "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797. #60103

PullRequests

Created

  • Formatting and code generation options #60127
    Area-IDE
  • Update 17.1-vs-deps to 17.1 in PublishData.json #60126
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60124
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60123
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use frozen partial semantics for syntax classification #60122
    Area-IDE
  • Add accessor to Razor test registration service #60121
    Area-IDE
  • Add analyzer/fixer that notifies people about explicit (but hidden) casts the compiler generates for foreach-statements. #60120
    Area-IDE
  • Disable IntelliCode RepositoryAttachedModels in CI #60119
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Roslyn.Diagnostics.Analyzers to 3.3.4-beta1.22160.2 #60118
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fixed compound assignment #60116
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Report a "better" error for an unmatched checked user-defined operator. #60111
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Initialize default capabilities before switching to the UI thread #60106
    Area-IDE
  • Update Light Bulb workarounds for 17.2 CI machines #60104
    Area-IDE
  • Provide keywords in completion list in certain CastExpression context #60102
    Area-IDE
  • Error when required members are not set #60101
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Fix type parameter scoping for local functions #60098
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Keep track of when a file code model is created. #60113
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make solution crawler and diagnostics options global #59800
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix NRE in VSTypeScriptGoToDefinitionServiceFactory #60105
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into CheckedUserDefinedOperators #60070
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Update Language Feature Status for ref fields #60061
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60097
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove unnecessary test method overrides #60094
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60128
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Respond with updated diagnostics when EnC diagnostics state is different #60081
    Area-IDE
  • Make IdeAnalyzerOptions global #59657
    Area-IDE
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • Fix binding order for Dispose in async foreach #60022
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams
  • Adjust delegate caching logic for abstract statics. #60092
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Use a longer timeout if we previously had a successful Source Link result #59698
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure generated trees have a full path #60095
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Source generators/fix exception latching #59930
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60044
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59939
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Global indentation options #59679
    Area-IDE
  • Analyze flow in receiver of extension method group in delegate creation #60093
    Area-Compilers
  • only include entry points defined in source #59836
    Area-IDE
  • Validate with `-testUsedAssemblies` in a CI leg #60052
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed simple signature help bugs #59969
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Option to always use default symbol servers for GTD #60053
    Area-IDE
  • Extend scope within nameof in attribute on method #40525
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, 17.1
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0 #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • WIP: Support smart pasting of contents into strings. #60036
    Area-IDE
  • [17.1 servicing] Update version of Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry #60096
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Introduce way for route handler delegates (Minimal APIs) to return union results (i.e. multiple `IResult` types) #40672
  • [Razor] CSS Isolation not working when special characters in project name #40668
  • Localized metadata for template is not localized templatestrings.{lang}.json #40666
  • Runtime razor compilation fails - cannot find HttpContext extension methods #40665
  • Quarantine ReadAsync_WithAllowInputFormatterExceptionMessages_RegistersJsonInputExceptionsAsInputFormatterException #40661
  • @bind and @bind-Value and @bind-Value for extra model behave different for datetime #40660
  • React SignalR - customHeader #40659
  • RAM problems when downloading files #40658
  • Make IResult concrete types public #40656
    7.0-preview3
  • Add perf test for endpoint filter vs. no endpoint filter #40655
    7.0-preview3
  • Runtime & EFCore Dependencies Out of Date #40653

Closed

  • RE-open: Blazor redirect to cshtml not work with renderMode = Server #39391
    Discussions
  • Add a code analyzer to ensure that razor pages that define Dispose actually implement IDisposable #40638
  • Enable packages for Mariner 2.0 #40253
  • Enable build of Linux Arm64 RPM packages #40252
  • Blazor Server App fails to restart when restarted by IIS #40595
    6.0.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Support tab characters in headers and unify validation code between servers. #40671
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Add architecture to targeting pack archives #40669
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for route handler filter factories #40667
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update CODEOWNERS #40664
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantining ReadAsync_WithAllowInputFormatterExceptionMessages_RegistersJsonInputExceptionsAsInputFormatterException #40662
    area-mvc
  • Revert "Arm64 installers Take 2 (#40562)" #40651
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Add the PublishArgs back #40670
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • [release/6.0] Build .rpm packages for linux arm64 #40504
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.4
  • [release/5.0] Remove unintentional space in LazIntermediateToken.cs file name #40474
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 5.0.16
  • [release/3.1] Update a few more components #40605
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.24
  • [Blazor] Fix race condition when caching for a type of QueryParameterValueSupplier (#40636) #40663
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.4
  • Build .rpm packages for linux arm64 #40485
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix race condition when caching for a type of QueryParameterValueSupplier #40636
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix installer build #40657
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix denial of service in ASP.NET Core via FormPipeReader #40648
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Support tab characters in headers and unify validation code between servers #40633
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Write fields directive to streamwriter #39900
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update HttpContextAccessor.cs #40578
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Remove downlevel runtimes from global.json #40393
    area-infrastructure
  • [Do not merge] Publish some installer artifacts for testing #40647
    area-infrastructure
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • feat : Add `StringSyntax` for regex parameters #40589
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Items do not render in CollectionView after scrolling when wrapped in ContentView #5248
  • BlazorWebView inside iOS can't be reloaded #5247
  • Ios Local device component css failing to load #5245
  • Erroneous warning about SurveyPrompt being unexpected name #5241
  • Setting WidthRequest / HeightRequest alters default horizontal alignment #5240
  • BlazorWebView interaction with components #5237
  • Toggle buttons #5236
  • Switch does not update when setting IsToggled from code #5226
  • Review code in Shell that's there to prevent overdraw on the navbar/statusbar #5217

Closed

  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting Android from Mac #4925
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting macOS from Mac #4924
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting iOS from Mac #4920
  • BlazorWebView inside Android can't be reloaded #5136
  • Android: IWindow.VisualDiagnosticsOverlay gets cleared when changing element properties #5202
  • IVisualTreeElement.GetVisualParent returns null for elements in Border #4614
  • fail to create .NET MAUI app #4876
  • CBPeripheralsEventArgs unreachable #4328
  • [Android] SwipeItem with gesture recognizer is not working correctly #4122
  • [Bug] TabbedPage->SelectedTabColor no work #2217
  • UIWindow is not registered in the services for the MauiContext #3952
  • [Bug] [Android] FlyoutPage.Detail not updating correctly on async operation #3279
  • [iOS, Android] Date and Time Picker shows wrong date in popup. #3759
  • Dependency Injection - Converter Parse Exception on MainPage #3747
  • [Bug] Editor throws UnhandledExceptionEventArgs on Windows #3370
  • [Windows] Incorrect RadialGradientBrush rendering #4040

PullRequests

Created

  • When Fill and Width/Height conflict, center View in Fill area #5251
  • WIP: Try to fix ALL doc warnings #5250
    area/docs 📓
  • Fix handler registration and page reuse in iOS tests #5249

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider adding empty default interface implementations for all interceptor interface methods #27625
    7.0.0
  • SQL Server: introduce UseUtf8() sugar to configure UTF8 properties #27624
    Backlog
  • Provide API for returning Func<TEntity, bool> predicated based on keys #27623
  • After upgrading from EF 6.0.1 to EF 6.0.2: broken query generation when using aggregate #27621

Closed

  • The global interceptor must take effect under the DbContext #27612
  • InMemory generates and assigns Id before SaveChanges #27611
  • System.InvalidOperationException: The connection was not closed. The connection's current state is connecting #27602
  • Cosmos: Wrong validation on shadow property Partition key #27559
  • Source Generator for EFCore for DB First users. #27553
  • Stop throwing for optional FKs if delete orphans timing is set to Never. #27218
    7.0.0
  • Stop automatically deleting orphans for optional relationships with cascade delete configured #27217
    7.0.0
  • InvalidOperationException on save after upgrading from 5 to 6 #27455
    6.0.4
  • Scaffolding with NRT generates non-nullable navigation property from principal to dependent #27496
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Scaffolding: Use "CodeTemplates" directory #27626

Merged

  • Remove quirks #27622
  • Stop deleting orphans for optional relationships configured for cascade deletes #27557
    breaking-change
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27615
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27593
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27614
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix scaffolding of reference navigations with NRT #27616

Updated

  • Add AtTimeZoneExpression and some relevant translations #26972
  • Fixes to support multi-dimensional arrays #27618
  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0 Preview 1 #27447
  • Attribute for configuring composite primary keys #27571
  • Refactor ReaderModificationCommandBatch #27584
